bibl.idno: The Papers of Henry Rose Carter [manuscript] ; HEALTHSCI MS-10.

bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Armistead Carter, September 6, 1911

div1.p: Carter expresses his devotion to Laura Armistead Carter. He also encloses a letter from Edward Champe Carter.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Armistead Carter, September 6, 1911
div1.p:
There is no question of
Ned having graduated at B.rs,
in Aug 30: as he told me he
I mean this-Aug 30 was the day
he said he would have his
big-billing done a second
time. Mr.M. having lost
the first one.

P.W. is well gone to her's sam-
ple's I - am tired but well,
Look here in 4 days you have had
2 visits & 3 letters from me
and
and I am afraid that is be-
ing too devoted & may be
I interfering with your rest.
How delightful it must be
to I get letters & to know that
one cannot answer them!
Don't you dare to write some
to tell us when we are
to meet you here

Hasta la vista mi hija-
y hasta luego tambien
